tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE timestamps (timestamp_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  call_timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL);

CREATE TABLE call_durations (duration_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  call_duration INTERVAL NOT NULL);

CREATE TABLE support_staffing (staffing_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  schedule_id INT REFERENCES support_call_schedule(schedule_id));
CREATE TABLE calls ( call_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, call_timestamp TIMESTAMP, call_duration INTERVAL )
CREATE TABLE agents ( agent_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, agent_name VARCHAR(50), shift_start TIME, shift_end TIME )
CREATE TABLE schedules ( schedule_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, agent_id INT, call_id INT, scheduled_time TIMESTAMP )
CREATE TABLE metrics ( metric_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, timestamp TIMESTAMP, total_calls INT, total_duration INTERVAL )
CREATE TABLE holidays ( holiday_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, holiday_date DATE, holiday_name VARCHAR(50) )
